entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:16 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -34.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peawanuck Airport 12:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -34.2°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -37.6°C
Wind: SW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
